interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Skederm Vitamin C X30 Power Serum. Hyaluronic Acid with Aquaxyl. 1 fl. oz. Review Date: 2016/04/12 Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 2 x 2 inches; 0.8 Ounces'} Review Text: I've tried several serums and like many of them... But Skederm's is one of my favorites. The spots on the side of my mouth are noticeably lighter. It has a thin texture and absorbs quickly without any sticky residue. But it's not primarily water. Nothing against water, but I prefer my serums to have some thickness to them to allow the ingredients time to penetrate my skin. This one has the feel of a light cream and a soft citrus scent. Also the ingredients are superior. It has the sodium hyaluronate version of HA, biotin, squalane and most importantly 3-O Ethyl Abscorbic acid. Also the unique pump top bottle gives me full control and delays oxidation. Highly recommended
~ Discount provided for evaluation and review Review Title: Brightens splotches Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gio Naturals Organic Moroccan Argan Oil, 4 oz - 100% Pure and USDA Certified for Face, Hair, Skin and Nails {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 2.2 x 2.1 inches; 8.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '820103119702'} This is 100% pure organic argan oil. Nothing added. Excellent quality and effective on our hair and nails. Most of the other brands that claim to be 100% pure argan oil actually add fragrance and preservatives. If you're using this on your face or hair, those extras can cause irritation and clogged pores. My wife and I especially like this pump top dispenser. You can precisely control how much you use. The greatest part,though, has to be the rock bottom price. We've seen this stuff top $20 per ounce. Here you get 4 ounces of cold pressed organic argan oil for 16 bucks. Recommend
<discount provided for evaluation and review Naturally powerful Eyelash Growth Serum for Long Eyelashes From Uptown Cosmeceuticals Contains Stem Cell & Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Dermatologist Lab Tested Lash & Eyebrow Growth Formula, 4 Months Supply, 3.5ml Uptown Cosmeceuticals {'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'Uptown Cosmeceuticals', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 0.7 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '685987989168', 'Manufacturer': 'RightChoiceMarket'} This serum works. My eyelashes are slightly darker and healthier after only a few applications. I use it at night and, while they aren't longer or thicker, they do look younger. Hopefully the results will last. No irritation or redness so far. Recommend
<discount provided for evaluation and review Some improvement RegenFX Skincare Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Green Tea Extracts and Hyaluronic Acid. Potent Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle Treatment, Skin Tightening, and Collagen Stimulation. Net Wt 1.0 oz/ 30 ml RegenFX Skincare ["Reset the clock and recover your skin's youth with this nourishing, sculpting, and firming cream that is infused with an energetic blend of essential oils. Formulated with RegenFX complex, this anti aging cream helps restore skins natural younger form, addressing and reversing sagging skin and loss of volume, elasticity, density and wrinkles. This all-in-one highly active energetic anti aging moisturizer focuses on cellular regeneration, lifting and wrinkles with the latest targeted peptide complexes. A joyous and energetic blend of proprietary ingredients that creates a therapeutic aromatherapy effect."] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 7 inches; 1.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FXMOIS-1', 'UPC': '641061984320', 'Manufacturer': 'Eureka Brands LLC'} This moisturizer arrived with a defective pump top dispenser. I tried running it under hot water and still couldn't get it to work. I understand that problems happen from time to time and contacted the seller to kindly inform them of my problem with this item. No response. I contacted the seller twice more over the next four days to arrange for an exchange and still have never heard one single reply.
< Discount provided for evaluation and review Defective product Genesea Perfecting Serum for Face for a Tightening, Optimally Hydrating Sensation - Innovative Anti Aging Beauty Facial Serum - Promotes Youthful, Glowing Looking, Lifted Skin Appearance - 1.1 Ounce {'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.6 x 1.6 inches; 1.6 Ounces'} Pros:
+ Natural ingredients sourced and imported from the Dead Sea
+ One of the few serums that contains Dunaliella salina
+ Botanical squalane, jojoba, wheat derived amino acids
+ Highly effective formula softens and smooths dry patches immediately
+ No chemicals, toxins, or pore clogging fillers
+ No palm oil
+ Efficient 1.1 ounce pump top container
+ Trusted brand / Family friendly ingredients
Cons:
- None
This is the best age fighting serum on the market. You only need a dime sized application for full coverage so the 1.1 ounce container should last. It's nearly impossible to find moisturizers or serums like Genesea's that include Dunaliella salina... a micro algae that survives in salt by producing massive amounts of carotenoids. Dunaliella salina is a natural anti ageing powerhouse and a weapon against oxidation and free radical formation. Highly recommended
< Discount provided for evaluation and review Premium, powerful, natural ingredients that you won't find in other serums 8 Oz Deep Cleansing, Vitamin Rich, Face Cleanser Gel {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 3 x 3 inches; 2.82 Ounces'} Pros:
+ 8 ounce container
+ Pump top dispenser
+ Amazing scent
+ Premium natural ingredients
+ Vitamins A,C,E, F, rosehip
+ Deep cleans and quickly rinses
+ Reasonable price for an extra large bottle
+ Made in USA by a trusted brand
+ Satisfaction guarantee
Cons:
- None
So happy with this cleanser by Isabel Fay. It comes in a high quality pump top bottle that can be reused, smells beautiful and most importantly doesn't aggravate my adult acne. Plus it thoroughly cleans my face and doesn't take an eternity to rinse off in the shower. Two pumps is sufficient for full face and neck coverage so I'm expecting this giant bottle to last several months. I also have the Isabel Fay toner and hyaluronic acid cream and they're just as wonderful as the rosehip cleanser. Wish they had a retinol serum and a night cream. Highly recommended
< Discount provided for evaluation and review Love Isabel Fay Makeup Storage Organizer,Oak Leaf Cosmetic Organizer and Jewerly Display Box - 2 Large Drawers Space and 2 Small Drawers Space- Saving,Clear,Stylish Acrylic Bathroom Case OAK LEAF ['Description: This crystal-clear organizer and drawer display beautifully on your bathroom vanity and have ample compartments to fit a multitude of cosmetic items. The drawer can be stacked with or used separately from the organizer. The clear acrylic and sleek design allows you to find everything with ease. Also it is easy to clean, once you find dirt or stain on it, you can clean it with a piece of damp cloth is seconds, unlike plastic, it is far more durable in quality, and compared with wooden ones, the crystal clear compartments enable you find what you are looking for with a few seconds. Number of Compartments: 18 Care and Cleaning: Clean with Water and mild Soap General Material: Acrylic Shipping Weight: 3.75 pounds Drawer and Top part removable Dimension: 240*150*187mm/9.5*5.9*7.4”Our Customer Satisfaction Money-Back Guarantee If you are not satisfied with the Makeup Storage Organizer just return them within 30 days for a full refund. No questions asked, no hassle. Scroll up to click the Add to Cart button to have your Makeup Storage Organizer shipped today.'] {'Special Feature': 'Portable', 'Color': 'Transparent', 'Brand': 'OAK LEAF', 'Package Type': 'Frustration-Free Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Mounting Type Tabletop Mount': '', '': 'Item Weight 1 Kilograms', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.3 x 9.7 x 7.3 inches; 2.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': '5852398', 'UPC': '602310180955', 'Manufacturer': 'Oak Leaf'} Pros:
+ Reasonable price
+ Solid and durable
+ Holds a ton
+ Dishwasher safe
+ Doesn’t take up much room on our counter
Cons:
None
This is a solid organizer. Much thicker acrylic than expected. Although you can separate the top and bottom and put it in the dishwasher, we spot clean ours with rubbing alcohol and a soft cloth. The drawers are easy to open and close, the liners are removable and the price is much cheaper than the competition. It matches perfectly with our acrylic cotton swab and cotton round holders. Highly recommended
< Discount provided for evaluation and review Beautiful Skederm Vitamin C X30 Power Serum. Hyaluronic Acid with Aquaxyl. 1 fl. oz. {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 2 x 2 inches; 0.8 Ounces'} I've tried several serums and like many of them... But Skederm's is one of my favorites. The spots on the side of my mouth are noticeably lighter. It has a thin texture and absorbs quickly without any sticky residue. But it's not primarily water. Nothing against water, but I prefer my serums to have some thickness to them to allow the ingredients time to penetrate my skin. This one has the feel of a light cream and a soft citrus scent. Also the ingredients are superior. It has the sodium hyaluronate version of HA, biotin, squalane and most importantly 3-O Ethyl Abscorbic acid. Also the unique pump top bottle gives me full control and delays oxidation. Highly recommended
~ Discount provided for evaluation and review Brightens splotches
profile:
**Updated User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user maintains a strong preference for organic and natural personal care products, now emphasizing high-quality serums that enhance skin health. Their holistic approach continues to include practical home organization items, reflecting a thorough commitment to personal care.

- **Quality Conscious**: Their dedication to authenticity and superior ingredients is evident in recent purchases, highlighting the importance of effective skincare solutions. The user's appreciation for high-performance products is further underscored by their positive experiences with premium-quality serums that demonstrate visible results.

- **Pricing Sensitivity**: While the user values quality, they remain sensitive to pricing, as seen in their choice of affordable yet effective options. This balance indicates a readiness to invest in both personal care and functional products that significantly improve their lifestyle.

- **Convenience Features**: User-friendly designs remain a priority, with satisfaction stemming from practical features in both skincare and organizational products. Their desire for ease of use continues to shape their selection process.

- **Positive Feedback**: The user increasingly engages in providing detailed feedback on their purchases, showing a commitment to effective communication with sellers and an emphasis on product performance and usability.

Overall, the user actively seeks high-quality organic skincare and practical solutions, with a strong focus on effectiveness, convenience, and value, guiding their purchasing decisions and interactions with sellers.
